lead_paragraph: There were no stumbles, no injuries, no after-race tragedies. Saturday was a great day — a much-needed great day — for horse racing.
snippet: There were no stumbles, no injuries, no after-race tragedies. Saturday was a great day — a much-needed great day — for horse racing.
